overview: The story of Marissa, the 19 year old daughter of a small town preacher. She’s always been “Daddy’s little girl” and never been in trouble, that is, until she meets Billy the town’s bad boy from the wrong side of the tracks. Before long, the two become lovers, but Marissa’s perfect world is turned upside down as her mother and father forbid her from seeing Billy, saying he’s a heathen and he’ll ruin her life. But the more they try to drive the two young lovers apart, the stronger their bond grows.
title: The Preacher's Daughter
